alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 9:10PM EDT until April 27 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Pinellas County in west central Florida... Northwestern Hillsborough County in west central Florida... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 909 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near East Lake to 6 miles west of Harbor Bluffs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Safety Harbor, Oldsmar, Kenneth City, Belleair, Belleair Bluffs, and Belleair Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
